application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Garage Block Rear Of Hazeldene Gardens
description: Details Pursuant to Conditions 3 (ground levels), 4 (materials), 5 (landscape scheme), 8 (SUDs), 9 (Parking allocation scheme), 10 (Secured by Design accreditation), 11 (construction logistics plan), 12 (demolition plan), 13 (fire strategy report), 14 (step free access), and 15 (building regulations) of planning permission ref. 56804/APP/2021/1354 dated 06-04-2021 for a Section 73 application seeking variation of Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission Ref: 56804/APP/2019/3696 dated 22-04-20 (Demolition of existing disused garages and erection of 2 x 4-bedroom semi-detached houses and associated external works) to amend proposed boundary to include existing garage walls.
